name: Cave Adventure (Lyrcaxis, Evaisa)
description:
Puzzle-solve your way towards the Exit and spare no Minions in doing so!

A Fun(hopefully) little Puzzle game where a Master and his Minions try to venture through the Cave.

 Controls: 
  • WASD to move
  • F1: Show Controls
  • Tab: Switch Between Minions
  • T: Select Player
  • X: Order minion to Wait
  • R: Order minions to Recall
  • Left-Click the Character Menu on the Right to manually select a character
  • Escape to Restart level
